unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics – Are You Really Seeing What You Think You Are?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics – Are You Really Seeing What You Think You Are?**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Ever felt like your Insta game is strong, but the engagement just isn't adding up? You're not alone! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Companies like Social Samose are offering granular insights beyond just vanity metrics. Think real demographics from places like Chennai to Chandigarh, not just a global mush.
normalised: Hey folks! Ever felt like your Insta game is strong, but the engagement just isn't adding up? You're not alone! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Companies like Social Samose are offering granular insights beyond just vanity metrics. Think real demographics from places like Chennai to Chandigarh, not just a global mush.

unnormalised: Turns out, a lot of "followers" are actually bots or inactive accounts. Shocking, right? These new analytics tools can help you weed out the wheat from the chaff. This is especially crucial if you're collaborating with influencers. That collab with Rahul from Delhi, promising 1 million followers might not be as fruitful if half of them are dormant since, say, 01/01/2020.

unnormalised: Imagine knowing when your audience in Mumbai is most active (spoiler: probably NOT 03:00 hrs!). Platforms are constantly tweaking algorithms, so staying updated is key. Get a grip on your real audience, and watch your ROI soar higher than the Qutub Minar. Experts say, if you aren’t leveraging deep analytics by the end of 2024, you are operating on gut feeling. Check it out!
